name: swr-vox-bi
description: Unified endpoint for Voice apps analytics requests
author: Daniel Freytag <daniel@frytg.com>

scripts.alexa: gcloud beta functions deploy swrBiAlexaV1 --env-vars-file stationConfig.yaml --project swr-lab --timeout 11 --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
scripts.google: gcloud beta functions deploy swrBiGoogleHomeV1 --env-vars-file stationConfig.yaml --project swr-lab --timeout 11 --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-http --region europe-west1
